local_news.title: Laat je inspireren op het VVP Kennisevent Pensioen & Vermogen
local_news.summary: VVP hosts the third Kennisevent Pensioen & Vermogen on 11 February 2026 at AFAS Theater, Leusden, featuring experts Noach van Beusekom and Corné van Zeijl, with breakout sessions by partners including Allianz, Brand New Day, NNEK and OAKK.

local_news.title: Laat je inspireren op het VVP Kennisevent Pensioen & Vermogen
local_news.summary: InFinance announces VVP’s third Kennisevent Pensioen & Vermogen on 11 February 2026 at AFAS Theater in Leusden, targeting financial advisors with plenary sessions by top specialists.

national_news.title: Vakbonden: vertrouwen geschaad door ingrepen in sociale zekerheid
national_news.summary: Dutch unions say raising the AOW pension age violates the pension accord and undermines trust, warning they may rally at The Hague’s Malieveld.

national_news.title: Langer doorwerken: dertiger van nu pas met 70 jaar met pensioen
national_news.summary: Dutch coalition parties D66, VVD and CDA propose AOW retirement age to rise faster from 2033, tied to life expectancy; CPB projects 70 years 9 months by 2060, so today’s thirty-somethings would retire around 70.

national_news.title: Marktreacties: 'Kabinet-Jetten lost hypotheekknelpunten vooralsnog niet op'
national_news.summary: Dutch coalition agreement under prospective PM Rob Jetten draws mixed housing-market reactions: De Hypotheekshop says mortgage bottlenecks persist, including interest-only limits and 2031 deduction issues; NHG welcomes sustainability plans, urging accessible financing and predictable policy.
